knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(feather)
library(lavaan)
library(psych)
library(broom)
library(ggthemes)
library(semTools)
```

```{r}
df <- read_feather("../results/tidy_filtered_responses.feather") %>% 
  mutate(response = ordered(response, levels = c("1", "2", "3", "4", "5")))
df
```




```{r}
socs_s_df <- df %>% 
  mutate(response = as.numeric(response)) %>% 
  pivot_wider(values_from = response, id_cols = ResponseId, names_from = item) %>% 
  select(starts_with("SOCS-S"))
  

socs_s_df
```

```{r}
socs_s <- polychoric(socs_s_df)
socs_s
```

```{r}
eigen(socs_s$rho)$values
```
Positive semidefinite

```{r}
socs_s_ordered_df <- df %>% 
  pivot_wider(values_from = response, id_cols = ResponseId, names_from = item) %>% 
  select(starts_with("SOCS-S")) %>% 
  rename_with(~str_c("s", str_extract(., "\\d+"))) %>% 
  mutate_all(~fct_drop(.))

socs_s_ordered_df
```


## One-factor model

```{r}
one_factor_model <- str_c("compassion =~ ", str_c(colnames(socs_s_ordered_df), collapse = " + "))
one_factor_model
```

(How should I deal with non-responses? Possibly use SEM)
(I am going to remove them for now and then use MICE)

```{r}
one_factor_cfa <- cfa.mi(
  one_factor_model, 
  m=3, 
  data=socs_s_ordered_df, 
  estimator="WLSMV", 
  miPackage="mice", 
  seed=1
  )
one_factor_cfa
```
```{r}
warnings(one_factor_cfa)
```

```{r}
five_factor_model <- '
recognizing_suffering =~ s1 + s6 + s11 + s16
universality_of_suffering =~ s2 + s7 + s12 + s17
feeling_of_suffering =~ s3 + s8 + s13 + s18
tolerating_discomfort =~ s4 + s9 + s14 + s19
alleviate_suffering =~ s5 + s10 + s15 + s20
self_compassion =~ recognizing_suffering + universality_of_suffering + feeling_of_suffering + tolerating_discomfort + alleviate_suffering 
'
```

```{r}
five_factor_cfa <- cfa.mi(
  five_factor_model, 
  m=3, 
  data=socs_s_ordered_df %>% mutate_all(~as.numeric(.)), 
  estimator="MLR", 
  miPackage="mice", 
  seed=1
  )
five_factor_cfa
```

```{r}
one_factor_cfa <- cfa(
  one_factor_model, 
  data=socs_s_ordered_df %>% mutate_all(~as.numeric(.)), 
  estimator="MLR"
  )
```

```{r}
one_factor_cfa_check <- cfa(
  one_factor_model, 
  data=socs_s_ordered_df %>% mutate_all(~as.numeric(.)),
  estimator="MLR"
  )
```
```{r}
summary(one_factor_cfa_check, standardized = TRUE, fit.measures = TRUE)
```
```{r}
one_factor_cfa_check@SampleStats@
```


```{r}
inspect(one_factor_cfa_check, what="std")$lambda
```



```{r}
one_factor_glance <- glance(one_factor_cfa)
one_factor_glance
```
```{r}
summary(one_factor_cfa, standardized=TRUE, fit.measures=TRUE)
```

## Ceiling and Floor Effects

```{r}
total_scores <- df %>% 
  mutate(response= as.numeric(response)) %>% 
  group_by(ResponseId) %>% 
  mutate(any_nas = any(is.na(response))) %>% 
  filter(any_nas == FALSE) %>% 
  filter(str_detect(item, "SOCS-S")) %>% 
  summarise(total = sum(response))

total_scores
```

```{r}
ggplot(total_scores, aes(x=total)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  theme_few()
```

```{r}
total_scores %>% 
  filter(total == 100)
```
